name: Cliffhanger Restaurant & Bar (Inside The Norwester Hotel)
text:
Here is the transcription of the Cliffhanger Restaurant & Bar menu, adhering to your preference for British/standardised spelling and avoiding simplified conventions.

BREAKFAST
Available until 12pm

Gluten Free Substitutions: Gluten Free Roasted Baby Potatoes $2.00 | Gluten Free Bread $2.00 Vegetarian Options (V)

CHEESE OMELETTE | $14 (V) Mixed cheeses. Served with home fries and your choice of toast

DENVER OMELETTE | $15 Ham, peppers, green onions, and mixed cheese. Served with home fries and your choice of toast

CLIFFHANGER SCRAMBLER | $18 Scrambled eggs, chopped ham and sausage, peppers, and green onions on home fries with cheese and Hollandaise sauce. Served with your choice of toast

GREEK OMELETTE | $15 (V) Peppers, onions, black olives, tomato, mixed cheeses, topped with feta cheese. Served with home fries and your choice of toast

COUNTRY BREAKFAST | $16 Two eggs any style, served with bacon or sausage. Served with home fries and your choice of toast

BUTTER MILK PANCAKES | $14 3 large pancakes with bacon or sausages

RAISIN CINNAMON FRENCH TOAST | $15 3 slices of Raisin Cinnamon French toast, with your choice of bacon or sausage

BREAKFAST BURRITO | $16 Eggs, peppers, ham, green onions, Pico de Gallo, and mixed cheese wrapped in a tortilla shell. Served with salsa and home fries

EGGS BENEDICT | $17 Two poached eggs, Canadian back bacon, on a toasted English muffin, smothered in creamy Hollandaise sauce, served with home fries

TOMATO EGGS BENEDICT | $15 (V) Two poached eggs, tomato, on a toasted English muffin, smothered in creamy Hollandaise sauce, served with home fries

CLIFFHANGER BREAKFAST SANDWICH | $14 One egg with bacon or sausage, melted cheddar cheese on a toasted English muffin, with a fruit cup or home fries

LIGHT BREAKFAST | $9 One egg any style, served with bacon or sausage, home fries, and toast

SIDE ORDERS Toasted English muffin $3 / Fruit cup $6 / Choice of toast (2) $4 / Bacon (4) $5 / Sausage (4) $5

LIGHT OPTIONS | $6 (V) Cold cereal with 2% milk (4 oz) or Hot Oatmeal with 2% milk (4 oz)

APPETISERS
Pickerel Sticks - $15 Pickerel sticks crusted with a panko and dill breading and fried to golden-brown. Served with tartar sauce

Chicken Wings - 1lb $16 | 2lb $28 Cliffhanger crispy chicken wings prepared with your choice of sauce: mild, medium, Frank's Red Hot, salt and pepper, dry Cajun, honey garlic, served with carrot, celery sticks, and ranch dressing

Onion Rings - $10 A basket of deep-fried onion rings served with ranch dressing

Just Fries - $9 Sweet potato fries served with Cajun lime dip or French fries served with ranch dressing

Snacker Platter - $25 Assortment of dry Cajun ribs, spring rolls, wings, onion rings, and mozzarella sticks

Nachos - $20 Baked corn chips topped with pub mixed cheese, bacon, banana peppers, green onions, and pico de gallo. Served with salsa and sour cream. Add: Grilled Chicken - $4 | Taco Beef - $4 | Guacamole - $4

Fish or Grilled Chicken Tacos - $15 Soft tacos with your choice of panko breaded pickerel or grilled chicken breast. Served with coleslaw, pico de gallo, and roasted garlic mayo

Dry Ribs - $16 Pound of Cajun dusted dry ribs fried served with Cajun mayo

Cliffhanger Poutine - $16 French fries, mozzarella cheese curds, apple-wood smoked bacon, green onions and smothered in house-made gravy

Chicken Strips - $15 Four tender strips of chicken served with plum sauce or ranch dressing. Add: French Fries $2

Breaded Shrimp (6pc) - $16 Golden Fried Jumbo Shrimp with cocktail sauce and Lemon

SOUPS
Cliffhanger Feature Soup - Cup $4 | Bowl $6 Made fresh daily

French Onion Soup - $9 Caramelised onions with a rich beef broth, baked with croutons and Swiss cheese.

SALADS
Available Dressings: House, Ranch, Balsamic, Italian, French, Thousand Island, Blue Cheese, or Raspberry Vinaigrette

Caesar Salad - Half $9 | Full $16 Romaine lettuce tossed with bacon bits, parmesan cheese, croutons and tossed in our zesty Caesar dressing

Cobb Salad - $18 Garden greens, topped with chicken strips, boiled egg, guacamole, carrots, bacon bits, grape tomato, cheddar cheese and served with blue cheese dressing

Steak & Goat Cheese - $20 Mixed greens, peppers, cucumber, grape tomatoes, and red onions, topped with a grilled 4oz AAA steak, goat cheese, and served with balsamic dressing

Taco Salad - $20 Mixed greens with pico de gallo, taco beef, shredded cheddar cheese, sautéed chicken breast and peppers, sour cream, guacamole, salsa, and served with tortilla chips

Mixed Greens - Half $8 | Full $14 Mixed greens with red onions, tomatoes, cucumber, peppers, and carrots

Hot Chicken Caesar - $20 Our own caesar salad with Cajun sautéed bell peppers, red onion, and grilled chicken breast

Greek Salad - Half $12 | Full $18 Romaine lettuce with cucumbers, red onions, tomatoes, peppers, feta cheese, kalamata olives

SANDWICHES & MORE
Choice of: French fries, Soup, Mixed garden salad, or Caesar salad

Philly Prime Rib Dip - $20 Grilled shaved prime rib, onions, peppers, and mushrooms, finished with melted Swiss cheese. Served with au jus on brioche bun

Grilled Reuben - $18 Shaved corned beef with sauerkraut, Swiss cheese and thousand island dressing on rye bread and grilled

Grilled Quesadilla - $18 A tortilla shell loaded with grilled roasted chicken, or taco beef, pico de gallo, mixed cheese, sautéed peppers and green onions

Beer Battered Haddock Fillets - 2pcs $18 | 3pcs $22 Two pieces of haddock drenched in a Sleeping Giant Northern Logger beer batter, and deep fried, served with coleslaw, lemon and tartar sauce

Cliffhanger Burger - $20 6 oz Char broiled AAA patty, served with apple-wood smoked bacon, cheddar cheese, lettuce and tomato, topped with onion rings

Cliffhanger Club - $18 Club sandwich with apple-wood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese, roasted turkey, cranberry mayo

Hot Turkey - $18 Open-faced sandwich with oven roasted turkey, and house made gravy on your choice of bread

Spicy Chicken Wrap - $16 Chicken strips deep fried until golden brown, tossed in Frank's Red hot sauce and Ranch dressing served with lettuce, tomatoes, banana peppers, green onions and shredded mixed cheese

Guacamole Veggie Wrap - $16 Spring mix, tomatoes, shredded carrots, peppers, sliced black olives, shredded mixed cheese & guacamole

Bison Burger - $23 Grilled 6oz Bison patty, topped with cheddar cheese, sautéed onions and mushrooms and BBQ sauce

AFTER 5PM
Butter Chicken - $26 Grilled marinated chicken breast topped with a creamy Butter chicken sauce served with mixed wild rice and vegetables

BBQ Back Ribs - $30 Slow roasted, tender pork back ribs, grilled with your choice of BBQ or honey garlic sauce. Served with fries & coleslaw

Chicken or Shrimp Alfredo - $26 Choice of fresh fettuccini or rigatoni pasta in a creamy garlic-parmesan sauce grilled chicken breast strips or sautéed shrimp, topped with Parmesan cheese. Served with garlic bread

Ribeye Steak - $54 12oz AAA Ribeye steak done to your liking served with creamy peppercorn brandy sauce, fries, and vegetables

Grilled Beef Liver and Onions - $24 Grilled dusted beef liver topped with onion mushroom gravy served fries and vegetables

Pickerel - $30 Pickerel fillet tossed in herbed flour and pan-seared. Served with mixed wild rice and vegetables.

Braised Beef Short Ribs - $48 10 oz braised short ribs in rich red wine sauce served with fries and vegetables

Pasta and Meatballs - $20 Choice of fettuccini or rigatoni pasta, five meatballs tossed with a rich tomato sauce, and topped with grated parmesan cheese. Served with garlic bread

Chicken Parmesan - $28 Choice of fettuccini or rigatoni pasta breaded baked chicken with a light tomato sauce topped with Swiss cheese and baked to perfection. Served with garlic bread

8 oz New York Steak - $34 8 oz of AAA New York steak grilled to your liking, with a blend of spices & seared over high heat to lock in the natural flavours. Served with creamy, peppercorn brandy sauce, fries, and vegetables

Add On's Jumbo Breaded Shrimp (4pcs) - $10 Garlic Bread (2pcs) - $4

PIZZAS
Pepperoni & Cheese Pizza - $19 Topped with marinara sauce, sliced smoked pepperoni and a mixed cheese

Mediterranean Pizza - $22 Marinara sauce, sliced peppers, onions, sliced mushrooms, artichoke, olives, mixed cheese, topped with feta cheese

Steak & Goat Cheese Pizza - $24 pizza topped with marinara sauce, mixed cheese, sautéed peppers, mushrooms, onions, and grilled steak slices, finished with goat cheese and balsamic glaze

Deluxe Pizza - $22 Banana Peppers, mushrooms, onions, olives, bacon bits and sliced pepperoni, topped with mixed cheese

BEVERAGES
Cup of Coffee/ Orange Pekoe Tea - $3.00 Fresh ground regular or decaf coffee

Herbal Tea - $3.50 Selected flavours from our tea chest

Skim, 2%, or Chocolate Milk - Small $2.50 | Large $3.50

Fruit Juices, Iced Tea or Lemonade - Small $2.50 | Large $3.50 Orange, Cranberry, Apple, Clamato, Tomato, and Grapefruit

Soft Drinks - $3.00 Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, 7-UP, or Ginger Ale

Hot Chocolate - $3.50 Served with whipped cream
